text: Hi all, its first time I am writing here and I am new to HubSpot, so bear with me, but I would like to get some guidance here and/or get some answers on question I have. So currently I am developing app that need data from HubSpot API, but still could'nt find the right API to get deals & contact at the same time. Is there any API that I can use to get both of those at the same time? For example, when I try to get one deal, I also get the contact related to that deal
I think they have the associations api, but the purpose is different. I did not find anything yet that would apply to you problem. But I want follow this, maybe it would be useful for me as well

Hi Guys, does anyone have an idea about how to register a user using the form Api with the HubSpotutk tracking code in order to create users from the backend but also having them associated with all the tracking events that the user did before the registration ?

[data studio / PMA connector]

Anyone using the PMA connector for HubSpot to Data Studio?

Have you seen discrepancies between the reports in Data Studio and the reports in HubSpot? :eyes:

We already checked for things like
• whether sampling was applied
• Changing the dimensions on which the contact date is based
• changing the time zone in the report settings in HubSpot
Still seeing some slight differences.
Hello Everyone, I was directed here by HubSpot Support Chat, I just have a quick question, has anybody found a way to upload files to Sales > Documents through the HubSpot API?
I believe <@U01E3692GUF> submitted an idea about this that you could upvote...have to find the link
